mapper.select: SELECT * FROM EXPENDS WHERE TO_CHAR(EXPEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth} AND STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY EXPEND_DATE DESC
SELECT DISTINCT TO_CHAR(EXPEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS yearMonth FROM EXPENDS ORDER BY 1 DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EXPENDS (EXPEND_NO,CATEGORY, AMOUNT, DESCRIPTION, EXPEND_DATE, STATUS) VALUES (SEQ_EXPEND_NO.NEXTVAL, #{category}, #{amount}, #{description}, #{expendDate}, 'N')
mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS "date", SUM(P.AMOUNT) AS sales FROM PAYMENT P WHERE TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = #{yearMonth} GROUP BY TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(P.CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ASC

SELECT TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'DY') AS day, CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'HH24')) BETWEEN 17 AND 20 THEN 'earlySales' WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'HH24')) BETWEEN 21 AND 2 THEN 'lateSales' END AS time_period, SUM(O.TOTAL_PRICE) AS sales FROM ORDERS O WHERE ORDER_DATE >= TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'D') - 7 -- 최근 7일 GROUP BY TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'DY'), CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'HH24')) BETWEEN 17 AND 20 THEN 'earlySales' WHEN TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(O.ORDER_DATE, 'HH24')) BETWEEN 21 AND 2 THEN 'lateSales' END ORDER BY day ASC

SELECT CASE WHEN C.CATEGORY_NAME = '주류' THEN '주류' WHEN C.CATEGORY_NAME = '음료' THEN '논알콜' ELSE '안주류' END AS category, M.MENU_NO AS id, M.MENU_NAME AS name, NVL(COUNT(OD.MENU_NO), 0) AS orders FROM ORDERS_DETAIL OD JOIN MENU M ON OD.MENU_NO = M.MENU_NO JOIN CATEGORY C ON M.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO GROUP BY C.CATEGORY_NAME, M.MENU_NO, M.MENU_NAME ORDER BY category, orders DESC

SELECT TO_CHAR(EXPEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') AS MONTH, COALESCE(SUM(AMOUNT), 0) AS TOTAL_EXPEND FROM EXPENDS WHERE EXPEND_DATE >= ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'), -5) GROUP BY TO_CHAR(EXPEND_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY MONTH
